Reviews.Title: Not a good phone
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: This phone is not a good phone, it only runs on 2g at most. The pixels suck. Nothing about this phone is good. The only good thing about it, is its weight. Very light in that aspect, but overall performance is terrible. Do not waste your money. I can't even watch netflix on it, because it only runs on 2G.Ray,  Wv

Reviews.Title: Great quadcore phone.
Reviews.Author: CINDY BELL
Reviews.Content: I find it very difficult to understand as to how lightahead is able to bring out high end models at lower than lower end models price.This is indeed a fairly well made quadcore phone with great high speed processor,good camera and immense call clarity.The sound is great and set up easy.Having a quadcore processor in a phone makes it a delightful experience as against the frustration and struggle experienced with most Chinese single core processors.The set up is easy and works best with AT&T.;This us vendor rocks. He has definitely created options in the market a big relief from the generic obsolete phones.Oveall great value for money.Super buy
